00002 Class: PulseEstimate
00003 Author: John R. Quirk
00004 
00005 This class takes data quality histograms from an
00006 alcapana production and predicts what certain
00007 correct ODB values are.
00008 ***********************************/
00009 
00010 #ifndef PULSEESTIMATE_H__
00011 #define PULSEESTIMATE_H__
00012 
00013 class TH1;
00014 
00015 class PulseEstimate {
00016 
00017 private:
00018   int fPedestal;
00019   int fPolarity;
00020   int fOffset;
00021 
00022 public:
00023   PulseEstimate();
00024 
00025   /* Estimates parameters of shapes histogram */
00026   /*
00027     Pedestal: Looks for the most common ADC value
00028     Polarity: Looks at the max and min ADC value
00029               and whichever is further from the
00030               estimated pedestal sets the polarity.
00031     Offset:   Looks for peak in timing correlation
00032               between MuSC and this detector
00033   */
00034   void Estimate(TH1* pulses, TH1* timing);
00035   int GetPedestal() const;
00036   int GetPolarity() const;
00037   int GetOffset() const;
00038 };
